subject: Attention Beneficiary Funds
body:
Attention Beneficiary Funds
ECO-WAS SCAM VICTIM COMPENSATION
I have successful registered your ATM CARD worth $4.8Million only
with Global Security Company with registration  Shipment code of (Code
awb 33xzs). please Contact
with your 
delivery information such as, Your Name, Your Address, Your
Telephone Number And 
Your ID for your identification
 .
E-mail: 
ap9773647@gmail.com
Name of director: Mr Albert Pedro.
Telephone: +229-99618855
I have paid for the Delivery fee.
The only fee you have to pay is their Security
fee only. Please indicate the registration Number and ask Him how much is their

Mrs. Ola Johnson

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary Funds
body:
Hello Mrs. Ola Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the registration of my ATM card with Global Security Company. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Could you please provide me with more information about the security fee that needs to be paid? I would like to understand the process and ensure that everything is legitimate.

Additionally, could you clarify what the purpose of the security fee is? It would be helpful for me to have a better understanding of why it is required.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Pearline
